sentences.english: Texture a watercolor sky when the paint is still wet.
sentences.chinese: 纹理水彩颜料时，天空仍是湿的。

sentences.english: Oils and acrylics can be repaired.
sentences.chinese: 油画颜料和丙烯酸都可以得到修复。

sentences.english: And she started dyeing her stockings and blouses there too.
sentences.chinese: 同时在宿舍里边，她开始用颜料染着袜子和上衣。

sentences.english: An impure oxide of cobalt, used to produce a blue color in enamel and in the making of smalt.
sentences.chinese: 浅的绿蓝色颜料，主要由钴和锡的氧化物组成。

sentences.english: Learn how to paint trees with watercolor paints in this free art lesson video.
sentences.chinese: 学习如何用水彩颜料画在这个自由艺术课视频树木。

sentences.english: The kids were splashing paint with abandon.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们任意地泼洒着颜料。

sentences.english: CMYK is a scheme for combining primary pigments.
sentences.chinese: CMYK是用来结合主要颜料的颜色设计方案。

sentences.english: Chromate-based pigments as well as Lead salts used as dryers could be substituted.
sentences.chinese: 铬酸盐基颜料以及铅盐用于干燥剂可以替代。

sentences.english: Use watercolor paints to touch up Polaroid transfers.
sentences.chinese: 使用水彩颜料来润色宝丽来转移。

sentences.english: He would pick out some areas with little blobby dyes blob blob blob blob great.
sentences.chinese: 他会在某些区域点上一块块的颜料。

sentences.english: Accessories would include fabric paint and pre-made screens.
sentences.chinese: 配件包括织物颜料和预制屏。

sentences.english: Inorganic pigments are finely ground complexes of metals.
sentences.chinese: 有机颜料是磨得很细的金属复合物。

sentences.english: Paint is spattered on eyeglasses. Mud lurks under fingernails.
sentences.chinese: 眼镜被颜料涂上颜色，泥土潜藏在指甲缝间。

sentences.english: Learn how to watercolor splatter paint in this free art lesson video.
sentences.chinese: 了解如何水彩颜料飞溅在这个自由的艺术课视频。

sentences.english: If any one medium cries for the broken color approach, this is it.
sentences.chinese: 水彩是一种需要处理复色的颜料。

sentences.english: Tempera was used to paint frescos hundreds of years ago.
sentences.chinese: 数世纪前蛋彩画颜料被用来画壁画。

definition: fine writing paper, originally from Jing county 涇縣|泾县, Xuancheng 宣城, Anhui
